name: Mini VPN - Fast, Unlimited, Secure, Free VPN Proxy
description: Mini VPN is the Top Free, Fast, Unlimited, and Ultra Secure VPN proxy for Android. Without any configuration, you can access the Internet securely and anonymously.  Mini VPN encrypts your connection, hides your IP address and secure your data. No one can track your online activities while your are on Mini VPN! Mini VPN protects your privacy with a secure connection on public WI-FI. Mini VPN helps unblock websites and apps.  Our team builds a worldwide VPN network to help you get access to servers from Canada, United States, United Kingdom, Germany, Netherlands, Singapore, India and many other countries.   Why choose Mini VPN? * High-speed bandwidth * Global server locations * Unblock VoIP networks and video call, such as: Skype, Imo, Viber etc ... * Unblock video websites, such as YouTube. It can also unblock videos not available in your country. * Unblock social network apps, such as: Line, QQ, WeChat, Instagram, Snapchat, Twitter, Facebook, WhatsApp etc ... * Support voice call and video call * Choose apps using VPN * No data usage and time limit * No registration or configuration required * Work with WiFi, 5G, LTE/4G, 3G and all mobile data carriers  Love Mini VPN? Leave us a 5-star review and all your feedback will be appreciated. For feature requests or further feedback, please do not hesitate to contact us via email minivpnapp@gmail.com.
